price: Àwọn ẹbí yín àti àwọn ọmọ yín kò lè ṣe yín ní àǹfààní; ní Ọjọ́ Àjíǹde ni Allāhu máa ṣèpínyà láààrin yín. Allāhu sì ni Olùríran nípa ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: لَن تَنفَعَكُمۡ أَرۡحَامُكُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡۚ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَفۡصِلُ بَيۡنَكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
category: She that is to be Examined

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lan tanfaʿakum arḥāmukum walā awlādukum yawma al-qiyāmati yafṣilu baynakum wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
